    Eq  CmpType = iota

## type [Filter](<https://github.com/blueprint-uservices/blueprint/blob/main/runtime/plugins/simplenosqldb/query/filter.go#L17-L20>)



```go
type Filter interface {
    Apply(item any) bool
    String() string
}
```
